content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
As an elementary school teacher, some key ways to instruct students individually and in groups include:

- Giving engaging lectures and presentations to the whole class on key topics and concepts
- Leading small group discussions and activities to reinforce learning and encourage participation 
- Providing one-on-one instruction and support to individual students as needed
- Using visual aids, multimedia, and hands-on demonstrations to illustrate ideas
- Assigning individual and group projects and guiding students through the work
- Facilitating collaborative learning by having students work in pairs or small groups
- Differentiating instruction to meet the varied learning needs and styles of students
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
